title.narrative: ADOLESCENTS AND YOUNG PEOPLE

description.narrative: Education COVID 19 response, which contributes to Adolescent Empowerment, Adolescent Empowerment (Covid), Children With Disabilities, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Skills Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Child rights are advanced through public advocacy, partnerships and social mobilization that promote non-discriminatory and gender- sensitive practices

title.narrative: Education COVID 19 response

description.narrative: Wider access to information;and services, skills and mentorship,;as well as opportunities for active participation;need to be strengthened for Serbian youth.;UNICEF in Serbia;works;to;build;youth;resilience and;prepare them for the;labour market;through;entrepreneurial and digital skills;programmes;reaching;more than;737;youth during 2020.;To increase;youth;active role in the community;UNICEF is;positioning;innovative platforms;for;amplifying;youth;perspective;gathering 8,217 U-Reporters;and volunteering engagement;with;1,020 volunteers.; | Status:Met | As-of Date:15/12/2020
